column4: hi all, I tried out Intrepid Ibex live cd on my new laptop yesterday and had quite a lot of issues. e.g. couldn't run apt-get since it complained on some corrupt files. would anyone recommend installing Intrepid Ibex or should I stick with Hardy Heron?
and to be honest: i'd never expect too much of the first release after an LTS one. the dev's are quite adventurous with these ....
